cmd.name: wind_of_wisdom
cmd.description: Increases the level of all existing units

cmd.name: starvation
cmd.description: Slowly decreases all food supplies for 2 minutes

cmd.name: golden_rain
cmd.description: Slowly adds gold to every settlement storage for 2 minutes

cmd.name: death_wish
cmd.description: Drains the life out of every druid and priest for 1 minute

cmd.name: bloodlust
cmd.description: Enables all units to inflict maximum damage for 6 minutes

cmd.name: teuton_disaster
cmd.description: Starts a Teuton uprising in every Teuton tent

cmd.name: transport_request
cmd.description: Transports the party to another map

cmd.name: build_catapult
cmd.description: Builds immobile long range catapult

cmdtext.text: Select a place to build catapult

cmd.name: stand_ground
cmd.description: Keeps army in battle formation (applies bonus)

cmd.name: leavearmy
cmd.description: Leaves the attached units on their own

cmdtext.default-text: Right-click to move the hero to this position

cmd.name: help-sacrifice
cmd.param: Help Sacrifice

cmd.name: learn
cmd.description: Gains knowledge from a more experienced unit

cmdtext.text: Click to learn from unit
Click to heal this unit

cmd.name: cloud_of_plague
cmd.description: Creates a cloud that slowly kills all affected units
cmd.param: Cloud of Plague, %s1 (requires Temple ritual)

cmd.name: ghoul_summoning
cmd.description: Summons a controllable ghoul that drains the life of nearby enemy units
cmd.param: Ghoul Summoning, %s1 (requires Druid House ritual)

cmd.name: beast_control
cmd.description: Takes control of one or more nearby animals (eagle, deer, wolf or crow)
cmd.param: Beast control, %s1 (requires Druid House ritual)

cmd.name: mass_heal
cmd.description: Heals nearby friendly units (sacrificing the person's life)
cmd.param: Mass Heal, %s1 (requires Druid House ritual)

cmd.name: hide
cmd.description: Renders all units in area invisible
cmd.param: Invisibility, %s1 (requires Druid House ritual)

cmdtext.text: Click to hide all units around this position
Click to hide all units around this position

cmd.name: wrath_of_jupiter
cmd.description: Channels the Wrath of Jupiter hurting the target (sacrificing the person's life)
cmd.param: Wrath of Jupiter, %s1 (requires Temple ritual)

cmdtext.default-text: Right-click to fire at this position

cmd.name: tribute
cmd.description: Sends resources to another location
cmd.failtext: Click on a townhall, village or outpost to start sending resources

Click on this outpost to start sending resources
Click on this village to start sending resources
